PrimaryPrivateCloudName.value: <Name of the existing primary private cloud that will contain the inter-private cloud link resource, must exist within this resource group>

PrimaryPrivateCloudResourceGroup.value: <Resource group name of the existing primary private cloud>

SecondaryPrivateCloudName.value: <Name of the existing secondary private cloud that global reach will connect to>

SecondaryPrivateCloudResourceGroup.value: <Resource group name of the existing secondary private cloud>
